channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric SE -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric SE -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-7773|2024-09-16T17:18:04.772Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- u.motion
item.description: The vulnerability exists within processing of nfcserver.php in Schneider Electric U.motion Builder software versions prior to v1.3.4. The underlying SQLite database query is subject to SQL injection on the sessionid input parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-9966|2024-09-16T22:55:48.511Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- pelco%20videoxpert%20enterprise
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's Pelco VideoXpert Enterprise versions 2.0 and prior. By replacing certain files, an unauthorized user can obtain system privileges and the inserted code would execute at an elevated privilege level.

item.title: CVE-2018-7769|2024-09-16T17:58:21.297Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- u.motion
item.description: The vulnerability exists within processing of xmlserver.php in Schneider Electric U.motion Builder software versions prior to v1.3.4. The underlying SQLite database query is subject to SQL injection on the id input parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-9960|2024-09-16T17:32:51.192Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- u.motion
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's U.motion Builder software versions 1.2.1 and prior in which the system response to error provides more information than should be available to an unauthenticated user.

item.title: CVE-2018-7236|2024-09-16T20:22:19.073Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- pelco%20sarix%20professional
item.description: A vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's Pelco Sarix Professional in all firmware versions prior to 3.29.67 which could enable SSH service due to lack of authentication for /login/bin/set_param could enable SSH service.

item.title: CVE-2018-7234|2024-09-16T16:23:49.001Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- pelco%20sarix%20professional
item.description: A vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's Pelco Sarix Professional in all firmware versions prior to 3.29.67 which could allow arbitrary system file download due to lack of validation of SSL certificate.

item.title: CVE-2018-7795|2024-09-16T17:03:52.342Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- powerlogic%20-%20pm5560%20prior%20to%20fw%20version%202.5.4
item.description: A Cross Protocol Injection vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's PowerLogic (PM5560 prior to FW version 2.5.4) product. The vulnerability makes the product susceptible to cross site scripting attack on its web browser. User inputs can be manipulated to cause execution of java script code.

item.title: CVE-2018-7768|2024-09-16T23:01:59.416Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- u.motion
item.description: The vulnerability exists within processing of loadtemplate.php in Schneider Electric U.motion Builder software versions prior to v1.3.4. The underlying SQLite database query is subject to SQL injection on the tpl input parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-7972|2024-09-16T17:59:07.360Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- powerscada%20anywhere
item.description: A vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's PowerSCADA Anywhere v1.0 redistributed with PowerSCADA Expert v8.1 and PowerSCADA Expert v8.2 and Citect Anywhere version 1.0 that allows the ability to escape out of remote PowerSCADA Anywhere applications and launch other processes.

item.title: CVE-2018-7766|2024-09-16T18:23:57.447Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- u.motion
item.description: The vulnerability exists within processing of track_getdata.php in Schneider Electric U.motion Builder software versions prior to v1.3.4. The underlying SQLite database query is subject to SQL injection on the id input parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-7973|2024-09-16T16:13:23.912Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- u.motion
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's U.motion Builder software versions 1.2.1 and prior in which an unauthenticated user can use calls to various paths allowing performance of arbitrary SQL commands against the underlying database.

item.title: CVE-2017-7974|2024-09-16T20:02:51.051Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- u.motion
item.description: A path traversal information disclosure vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's U.motion Builder software versions 1.2.1 and prior in which an unauthenticated user can execute arbitrary code and exfiltrate files.

item.title: CVE-2017-7971|2024-09-16T22:15:34.585Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- powerscada%20anywhere
item.description: A vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's PowerSCADA Anywhere v1.0 redistributed with PowerSCADA Expert v8.1 and PowerSCADA Expert v8.2 and Citect Anywhere version 1.0 that allows the use of outdated cipher suites and improper verification of peer SSL Certificate.

item.title: CVE-2017-6021|2024-09-16T22:56:53.661Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- clearscada
item.description: In Schneider Electric ClearSCADA 2014 R1 (build 75.5210) and prior, 2014 R1.1 (build 75.5387) and prior, 2015 R1 (build 76.5648) and prior, and 2015 R2 (build 77.5882) and prior, an attacker with network access to the ClearSCADA server can send specially crafted sequences of commands and data packets to the ClearSCADA server that can cause the ClearSCADA server process and ClearSCADA communications driver processes to terminate. A CVSS v3 base score of 7.5 has been assigned; the CVSS vector string is (AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

item.title: CVE-2018-7790|2024-09-16T19:52:22.431Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- modicon%20m221%2C%20all%20references%2C%20all%20versions%20prior%20to%20firmware%20v1.6.2.0
item.description: An Information Management Error vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's Modicon M221 product (all references, all versions prior to firmware V1.6.2.0). The vulnerability allows unauthorized users to replay authentication sequences. If an attacker exploits this vulnerability and connects to a Modicon M221, the attacker can upload the original program from the PLC.

item.title: CVE-2017-9964|2024-09-16T20:36:19.074Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- pelco%20videoxpert%20enterprise
item.description: A Path Traversal issue was discovered in Schneider Electric Pelco VideoXpert Enterprise all versions prior to 2.1. By sniffing communications, an unauthorized person can execute a directory traversal attack resulting in authentication bypass or session hijack.

item.title: CVE-2018-7238|2024-09-16T16:38:30.111Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- pelco%20sarix%20professional
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exist in the web-based GUI of Schneider Electric's Pelco Sarix Professional in all firmware versions prior to 3.29.67 which could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2018-7779|2024-09-16T17:23:51.444Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- wiser%20for%20knx
item.description: In Schneider Electric Wiser for KNX V2.1.0 and prior, homeLYnk V2.0.1 and prior; and spaceLYnk V2.1.0 and prior, weak and unprotected FTP access could allow an attacker unauthorized access.

item.title: CVE-2018-7785|2024-09-16T18:08:37.585Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- u.motion%20builder
item.description: In Schneider Electric U.motion Builder software versions prior to v1.3.4, a remote command injection allows authentication bypass.

item.title: CVE-2018-7782|2024-09-16T19:46:56.135Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- pelco%20sarix%20professional%20v1
item.description: In Schneider Electric Pelco Sarix Professional 1st generation cameras with firmware versions prior to 3.29.69, authenticated users can view passwords in clear text.

item.title: CVE-2018-7237|2024-09-16T23:00:39.249Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- pelco%20sarix%20professional
item.description: A vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's Pelco Sarix Professional in all firmware versions prior to 3.29.67 which could allow a remote attacker to delete arbitrary system file due to lack of validation of the /login/bin/set_param to the file name with the value of 'system.delete.sd_file'

item.title: CVE-2017-9962|2024-09-16T19:15:45.794Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- clearscada
item.description: Schneider Electric's ClearSCADA versions released prior to August 2017 are susceptible to a memory allocation vulnerability, whereby malformed requests can be sent to ClearSCADA client applications to cause unexpected behavior. Client applications affected include ViewX and the Server Icon.

item.title: CVE-2018-7789|2024-09-16T19:46:43.918Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- modicon%20m221%2C%20all%20references%2C%20all%20versions%20prior%20to%20firmware%20v1.6.2.0
item.description: An Improper Check for Unusual or Exceptional Conditions vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's Modicon M221 product (all references, all versions prior to firmware V1.6.2.0). The vulnerability allows unauthorized users to remotely reboot Modicon M221 using crafted programing protocol frames.

item.title: CVE-2018-7229|2024-09-16T19:15:37.311Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- pelco%20sarix%20professional
item.description: A vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's Pelco Sarix Professional in all firmware versions prior to 3.29.67 which could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to bypass authentication and gain administrator privileges because the use of hardcoded credentials.

item.title: CVE-2018-7783|2024-09-16T21:02:18.009Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- somachine%20basic
item.description: Schneider Electric SoMachine Basic prior to v1.6 SP1 suffers from an XML External Entity (XXE) vulnerability using the DTD parameter entities technique resulting in disclosure and retrieval of arbitrary data on the affected node via out-of-band (OOB) attack. The vulnerability is triggered when input passed to the xml parser is not sanitized while parsing the xml project/template file.

item.title: CVE-2018-7231|2024-09-16T19:21:08.252Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- pelco%20sarix%20professional
item.description: A vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's Pelco Sarix Professional in all firmware versions prior to 3.29.67 which could allow execution of commands due to lack of validation of the shell meta characters with the value of 'system.opkg.remove'.

item.title: CVE-2018-7784|2024-09-16T19:35:35.515Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- u.motion%20builder
item.description: In Schneider Electric U.motion Builder software versions prior to v1.3.4, this exploit occurs when the submitted data of an input string is evaluated as a command by the application. In this way, the attacker could execute code, read the stack, or cause a segmentation fault in the running application.

item.title: CVE-2018-7771|2024-09-16T20:02:13.635Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- u.motion
item.description: The vulnerability exists within processing of editscript.php in Schneider Electric U.motion Builder software versions prior to v1.3.4. A directory traversal vulnerability allows a caller with standard user privileges to write arbitrary php files anywhere in the web service directory tree.

item.title: CVE-2018-7227|2024-09-16T20:07:30.640Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- pelco%20sarix%20professional
item.description: A vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's Pelco Sarix Professional in all firmware versions prior to 3.29.67 which could allow retrieving of specially crafted URLs without authentication that can reveal sensitive information to an attacker.

item.title: CVE-2018-7781|2024-09-16T19:56:23.773Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- pelco%20sarix%20professional%20v1
item.description: In Schneider Electric Pelco Sarix Professional 1st generation cameras with firmware versions prior to 3.29.69, by sending a specially crafted request an authenticated user can view password in clear text and results in privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2018-7763|2024-09-16T18:55:37.819Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- u.motion
item.description: The vulnerability exists within css.inc.php in Schneider Electric U.motion Builder software versions prior to v1.3.4. The 'css' parameter contains a directory traversal vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-9961|2024-09-16T20:06:55.630Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- proface%20gp-pro%20ex
item.description: A vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's Pro-Face GP Pro EX version 4.07.000 that allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code. Malicious code installation requires an access to the computer. By placing a specific DLL/OCX file, an attacker is able to force the process to load arbitrary DLL and execute arbitrary code in the context of the process.
